text:
窓は開いてる
だが誰かが
押し入った
形跡は無し
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11.75%;top: 4.68%;width: 11.69%;height: 8.47%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 50.66%;top: 4.01%;width: 8.47%;height: 3.94%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
何の臭いだ?
血じゃない
甘い匂いだ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 84.43%;top: 23.80%;width: 10.26%;height: 8.47%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
いや忘れろ。
犯行現場だ。
何も触れずに
出るべきだ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11.75%;top: 39.13%;width: 13.37%;height: 10.14%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 13.54%;top: 51.96%;width: 9.90%;height: 6.54%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
クソ!
急いでたから
携帯忘れた
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 55.55%;top: 38.21%;width: 10.26%;height: 6.71%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 55.31%;top: 45.17%;width: 11.10%;height: 4.11%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 69.15%;top: 38.63%;width: 7.88%;height: 5.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 89.20%;top: 41.38%;width: 6.56%;height: 3.86%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 10.92%;top: 63.36%;width: 7.76%;height: 3.52%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
家の
固定電話も
死んでる
みたい
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 9.13%;top: 67.22%;width: 12.05%;height: 7.04%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
じゃ最寄りの
警察署に行こう
ここを出…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 27.86%;top: 64.37%;width: 15.39%;height: 8.21%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
